articles.title: World’s wealthiest clash over bitcoin: Gates advises to stay away, while Musk causes cryptocraze - RT
articles.description: While Elon Musk has been driving a buying frenzy in the cryptomarket, anyone who has less money than the richest person on the planet should avoid investing in bitcoin, multi-billionaire Bill Gates says.
articles.content: The Microsoft co-founder, who boasts the third-largest fortune in the world and calls himself a “bitcoin skeptic,” took on the world’s most popular cryptocurrency several times this week. In one of h… [+2227 chars]
